property.name: catchRate
property.description: Held item when traded to gen2

property.name: attack
property.description: The Attack stat as it appears in the Pokemon's summary page in game

property.name: defense
property.description: The Attack stat as it appears in the Pokemon's summary page in game

property.name: speed
property.description: The Attack stat as it appears in the Pokemon's summary page in game

property.name: special
property.description: The Attack stat as it appears in the Pokemon's summary page in game

property.name: hp
property.description: Calculated from the IVs; not actually stored in memory

property.name: starterPokemon
property.description: The starter Pokemon received from Oak.

property.name: joypadSimulation
property.description: Setting this to true will disable collision for your character.

property.name: joypadIgnore
property.description: Setting this to true will disable collision for your character.

property.name: flyOrDungeon
property.description: the target warp is a fly warp (bit 3 set or blacked out) or a dungeon warp (bit 4 set)

property.name: trashCanPuzzle
property.description: Set value to 3 to solve the puzzle. Freezing this property breaks the gym trainers.

property.name: animationTurn
property.description: This dictates which direction battle animations are played. (Enemy attacking player, or player attacking enemy.)

property.name: lowHealthAlarm
property.description: This is set to 0 at the start of battle and 1 when the opponent has lost

property.name: attackDamage
property.description: Amount of damage attack is about to do. Max possible damage may appear one frame before actual damage.

property.name: battleStart
property.description: When 0 battle is starting, when >=1 battle has begun

property.name: textSpeed1
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both 1 and 2 are set to false

property.name: textSpeed2
property.description: Fast text speed is set when both 1 and 2 are set to false

entry.value: Fast Text, No Animations, Battlestyle Set
Viridian City, Pewter City, Saffron City
